Row.Text: Unique Necromancer replacement for the Water Mill. +3 [ICON_Production] Production. Can only be built next to a river
The Bone Mill provides a significant early bonus to production, allowing for faster troop deployment.
The Bone Mill, a replacement for the Water Mill, shifts the focus from producing [ICON_FOOD] to enhancing [ICON_PRODUCTION]. Provides a significant early boost to [ICON_PRODUCTION].
Unique Necromancer replacement for the Aqueduct. +2 [ICON_CULTURE] culture and +2 [ICON_PEACE] faith.
The Blood River enriches the necromancers Faith and Culture. May the streets run red with blood.
The Blood River, a replacement for the Aqueduct, shifts the focus from saving [ICON_FOOD] to enhancing [ICON_CULTURE] and [ICON_PEACE].
Unique Necromancer replacement for the Lighthouse. +2 [ICON_SCIENCE] science on sea tiles. +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] science from [ICON_RES_FISH]. +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] from sea resources.
The Ghost Light explores the depths of the unknown, providing an increase to [ICON_SCIENCE] science, and also improves effeciency of workboats. Must be constructed on the ocean
The Ghost Light, a replacement for the LightHouse, shifts the focus from [ICON_FOOD] to [ICON_SCIENCE].
